== Pernem (M Cl) (803241) ==

Pernem (M Cl) is a town in the [[PERNEM]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 2.52 sq. km. and harbouring 1202 households with total population of 5021 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 29 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 29 km. Male population is 2557 and female population is 2464. Scheduled Caste population is 262 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the town is 803241<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipal Council'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 148 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 450 km. Railway station is at PERNEM at a distance of 2 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 1700 kilo-litres.

There is fire fighting service in the town.
